title: ByeTools is getting Undertale support (and I guess this is the first time I've ever mentioned it)!
snippet: So, recently I decieded to start playing Undertale, and after about two hours(!) I decided to change up my save game. Unfortunatly, Annoying Dog had other ideas.So, what about stopping this? There is a tool called UndertaleSandbox that can do this, but I find it restrictive and hard to use. How a...

title: How I Got This To Work
snippet: Hello, and welcome to my brand-new, revamped website! Using GitHub Pages, I’ve been hosting a small website for the last few months. However, I’ve been wanting to start a blog. For this, I’m going to use Jekyll. Jekyll lets you make dynamic websites. It’s mainly used as a blogging tool, and Pages...
